info.name: JP
info.description:
This will cover the foundational setup, and you can expand it to include the specific B2C and B2B features.

**Changelog**:

2025/03/10 - 62 API end Points for now

2025/03/11 - 72 API end Points for now

2025/04/30 - 118 API end points
